revised_title: The Exploitation of British Mineral Resources and Countryside Conservation
tldr: This article discusses the significant growth of the aggregates industry in Britain and its impact on the landscape and environment. It highlights the technical, economic, and geographical factors affecting the industry and outlines the properties, uses, and resources of aggregates. The author also explains the Institute of Geological Sciences' contribution to improving knowledge of national resources and the importance of standardized specifications and testing procedures for aggregates.
